txt.en: The path ahead is blocked by flame
The beast does not seem to notice you, yet
Strange spiders gather in the caverns ahead
Caverns of Thrumfall
Flame blocks the path ahead, protecting Etterfang
With the drake nest cleared, the path to Etterfang is now clear
Now is your chance to weaken a pillar!
The cavern ceiling above Etterfang is starting to weaken!
The cavern ceiling is about to collapse!
'Did you really think you could sneak up on me?'
'I heard you scuffing and thumping through my caves since first you entered them.'
'If you have come for my hoard, you have come for naught.'
'Worse than naught, for your reward is my wakened wrath.'
'How well I remember Scatha the Worm, and the many dwarves he slew.'
'How well I remember Smaug the Golden, my beloved kin, and all his fury.'
'And well, too well, I remember my own strength and devastation, when my wings worked and I was whole...'
'Before that craven, insolent little dwarf crept up on me in my slumber.'
'Before his hard hammer mangled me and he paid with his wretched, little life.'
'[placeholder]!'
'Etterfang's brood follows us from Stormwall!'
'We will hold them off here while you delve further into the spider caverns.'
'We will follow your lead soon enough, for I would not miss the chance at defeating Etterfang!'
'Who enters the nest?!'
You must have completed 'Discovery: Stormwall' to play this instance.
'Hold for a moment, [placeholder]!'
'If I were in the whole of my health, you would already be but cinders.'
'Listen closely. Etterfang still slumbers.'
'And yet even so, I am fiery death fast upon you!'
'It is possible that we could take the dragon by surprise.'
'Just as the Dwarf, Borin, attempted those many years ago.'
'Now my Zhélruka brothers. Let us best this beast....'
'We attack on your word, [placeholder].'
'This is an historic day for the Zhélruka!'
'We are with you.'
'[placeholder], I have joined you as soon as I could!'
'Is that what I believe it to be?!'
'If we cause the cave to collape, we might just defeat this beast!'
'Why it is! It is indeed the The Stave of Veluk-zámok!'
The path ahead must lead towards Etterfang
